Kolby Greiner

Biography

HONORS AND AWARDS

MVC Honor Roll: 2020

Bradley Athletic Director's Honor Roll: Spring '20

2019-20 SEASON

Cross Country: Did not compete during the cross country season.

Indoor: Clocked a season-best time in the 3,000m run at the MVC Championship with a mark of 8:50.59 • Also ran the mile and 5,000m during the season, posting times of 4:35.29 and 15:14.45.

HIGH SCHOOL

Four-time team MVP for cross country at Iowa City West High School, while earning the honor three times for the track distance team • Helped lead the Trojans to a fifth-place team finish at the 2016 Iowa Cross Country Championship, while placing second at the state track and field meet in 2018 • Individually, finished as high as third at the state cross country championship during his senior season • Recorded five top-10 finishes at the state meet in track during his career, peaking at third in the 3,200m in 2017 • Received elite all-state honors in cross country in 2016 and 2018, while earning the accolade in track in 2017 • Two-time MVC Cross Country Athlete of the Year and four-time MVC champion in track • Also received first-team all-conference honors three times in cross country.

PERSONAL

Born May 3, 2000 • Son of Mark and Sadie Greiner • Mother ran at Iowa • Two siblings – Kaleb and Mackenzie • Majoring in entrepreneurship.
